document.full_text: ford motor co  is aiming to expand its presence in the fast-growing auto markets of india and china with an eye toward increasing the number of vehicles it sells per year by 50 percent by the middle of the decade.
document.title: ford eyes india, china to hit 50 percent growth target
lines_and_colors: ford motor co  is aiming to expand its presence in the fast-growing auto markets of india and china with an eye toward increasing the number of vehicles it sells per year by 50 percent by the middle of the decade.
